name: Playroom Inc
description: Developer of a multiplayer toolkit platform designed to build multiplayer games in minutes. The company's platform offers a low-code SDK and AI tools, which is a great option for indie developers, game studios, and students who want to create multiplayer games without having to spend a lot of time and money, enabling developers to create games easily.
one_liner: Developer of a multiplayer toolkit platform designed to build multiplayer games in minutes. The company's platform offers a low-code SDK and AI tools, which is a great option for indie developers, game studios, and students who want to create multiplayer games without having to spend a lot of time and money, enabling developers to create games easily.
